title: T204 Ramly Fromme for sale TTT back
author: soxinseven

posts.post_title: T204 Ramly Fromme for sale TTT back
posts.post_content: I have a t204 Fromme with a tougher TTT back for sale. The card presents well. It does have a small black mark on the left border and a pencil mark across the front. A nice card for a type collection. Price is SOLD  shipped and forms of payment are Paypal friends and family or personal check.
SOLD! I'll take it. PM sent for payment details.

Thanks Steve!!

Anyone else have any T.T.T.'s to sell please PM

Scott
